statements: SELECT * FROM compliance_data
SELECT policy_form_name, policy_disclosures FROM compliance_data
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE policy_form_id = 'abc-123'
SELECT policy_form_name FROM compliance_data WHERE policy_disclosures LIKE '%important%'
SELECT compliance_report FROM compliance_data ORDER BY policy_form_id DESC
SELECT policy_form_name, compliance_report FROM compliance_data WHERE policy_form_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE policy_disclosures LIKE '%important%';
SELECT policy_form_name, LENGTH(compliance_report) AS report_length FROM compliance_data ORDER BY report_length DESC;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT policy_form_id) AS unique_forms FROM compliance_data;
SELECT policy_form_name, compliance_report FROM compliance_data WHERE policy_form_name LIKE 'A%' AND compliance_report IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM policy_forms;
SELECT form_name, compliance_date FROM policy_forms WHERE form_id = 1;
SELECT form_description FROM policy_forms WHERE compliance_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT report_name, report_content FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT form_name, form_description FROM policy_forms WHERE compliance_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT form_name, form_description, compliance_date FROM policy_forms WHERE form_id = 3;
SELECT report_name, report_content FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_id = 2;
SELECT form_name, compliance_date FROM policy_forms WHERE form_id IN (1, 2, 4);
SELECT * FROM policy_forms WHERE is_approved = true
SELECT form_id, form_name FROM policy_forms
SELECT form_id, form_name, is_approved FROM policy_forms WHERE form_name = 'Policy A'
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT report_id, report_status FROM compliance_reports
SELECT form_name, is_approved FROM policy_forms WHERE is_approved = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM policy_forms WHERE form_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT disclosure_text FROM disclosures WHERE is_published = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT form_name, is_approved FROM policy_forms WHERE form_name LIKE '%Insurance%' ORDER BY form_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM policy_forms ORDER BY form_id DESC;
SELECT form_name, form_category FROM policy_forms WHERE form_category = 'Agreements';
SELECT * FROM disclosures WHERE disclosure_type = 'Legal';
SELECT disclosure_name, disclosure_content FROM disclosures ORDER BY disclosure_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_type = 'Quarterly' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_forms WHERE form_category = 'Healthcare' ORDER BY form_name DESC;
SELECT disclosure_name, disclosure_type FROM disclosures WHERE disclosure_type = 'Legal';
SELECT form_name, form_category FROM policy_forms WHERE form_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT regulation_name, regulation_description FROM insurance_regulations ORDER BY regulation_id;
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports WHERE report_type = 'Quarterly' AND report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM policy_forms;
SELECT form_name, policy_type, issuance_date FROM policy_forms WHERE form_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT policy_id, disclosure_text, publication_date FROM disclosures WHERE publication_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM policy_forms;
SELECT form_name, policy_type FROM policy_forms ORDER BY issuance_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM disclosures WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_forms.form_name AS policy_name, COUNT(*) AS total_disclosures FROM disclosures INNER JOIN policy_forms ON disclosures.policy_id = policy_forms.form_id GROUP BY policy_forms.form_name;
SELECT u.username, ur.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles ur ON u.user_id = ur.user_id WHERE ur.role_name = 'Admin';
